turn.0: ELI5: How do the id, ego, and super-ego operate inside one's psyche?
turn.1: I think personally that tossing his writings aside is absolutely the best approach. All of them.
turn.2: Yes. I get that that's what you want. I was asking a different question. The objective here wasn't to challenge the validity of Freud's work.
turn.3: It's very clear that that wasn't your objective, but Freud's work doesn't have any validity to challenge. This is a man who invented the theory of the subconscious to explain why people believed they _didn't_ want their own mothers sexually. So much nonsense passed into pop culture. Anally retentive. It's all complete nonsense from a clearly deranged man and you're giving it **way** more respect than it deserves.
turn.4: It seems to me you’ve never read any of the work. Why is your hatred so virulent?
turn.5: That's a very vague and ad hominem rebuttal. To reply in kind, it seems to me you've never had a logical thought. Why is your critical thinking so absent?
turn.7: And I'm not interested in trying to rationalise the irrational nonsense Freud spouted. I'll call it out as nonsense when I come across it, thank you very much.
